note.p: Landowner. Of Sansaw Hall, Clive, and Leighton Hall, Shropshire. Justice of the peace. Changed his surname from Panting to Gardner in 1844.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1887/31/11)
England, select deaths and burials, 1538–1991 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 4 December 2018)

Settlements and Wills 1834–1865 and affairs of T.C. Eyton (Shropshire Archives 665/493: https://discovery.nationalarchives.gov.uk/details/r/b485b5e1-2ddb-4e36-ab34-5a76c4b90f2e, accessed 26 September 2022)
